ca.carleton.sysc3110.project.models.actions

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.carleton.sysc3110.project.models.actions.Action
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlantCreate, PlantShoot, ZombieMove, ZombieSpawn

    public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Action. The main variables of the Action Class are the source that creates the action and the type of action that was created (move, eat, shoot, etc).
